DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFCASE : RESTAURANTS AND RETAIL
DOC.TEXT: Good Food , Good Drink , to Help Food_Bank : The Food Distribution Center , a nonprofit food_bank in Orange , will present its 10th annual " Passport to End Hunger " food fair and wine tasting gala on Thursday , Oct . 13 , from 5:30 to 8:30 p.m. in Crystal Court at South Coast Plaza in Costa Mesa . Those who make a $ 35 contribution will be able to sample food and drink from more_than 60 of Southern California ' s best restaurants , wineries and breweries . KTLA sportscaster Ed Arnold will act_as master of ceremonies .
